testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I should be able to access announcements via API connection.
testcase.name: Invalid Token When a GET request is sent to the /api/getBloodGroup endpoint with invalid authorization information, it should be verified that the status code returned is 403 and the message in the response body is "You do not have authorization or token error.".
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/getNotice" path parameters........................passed * The api user sends a GET request and saves the returned response.........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 403........................passed * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "You do not have authorization or token error."..passed
